data.content:
# Writeup

Tldr: pptm (powerpoint with VBA script) patch challenge

1. remove password protection of pptm, so that we can read and modify the vba code. using tools https://github.com/petemc89/craXcel-desktop   
2. change probability of drawing 5 star card draw   
   ![Screenshot_2023-11-11_192334.png](https://www.cms.void-dojo.ninja/uploads/Screenshot_2023_11_11_192334_d1f45541ca.png)   
3. print the card url out (https://tar.bz2.top/rr0oy1cq5e62yb3cyvavvhjkpqtrgqqis9lmm7dib5h8oiplxw4px2fpumzuehsx) , copy the flag
   ![Screenshot_2023-11-11_192254.png](https://www.cms.void-dojo.ninja/uploads/Screenshot_2023_11_11_192254_6a135ca028.png)
![Screenshot_2023-11-11_192311.png](https://www.cms.void-dojo.ninja/uploads/Screenshot_2023_11_11_192311_59b033c8cb.png)
![Screenshot 2023-11-13 063953.png](https://www.cms.void-dojo.ninja/uploads/Screenshot_2023_11_13_063953_b0874f93f8.png)
Here we get the flag `hkcert23{FIl1liIIlI1III1lll1IlI11ag_Hmrnmmrnmmmrnmn} `
